description: This is a Dart source file implementing an API client for a backend service. It provides methods to check health, perform conversions, retrieve graph data, and handle API errors, encapsulating HTTP requests and response parsing.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A class providing methods to interact with a backend API, including health check, conversion, and graph retrieval functionalities.

classes.name: ApiException
classes.description: A class representing exceptions arising from API errors, encapsulating HTTP status code, message, and response body.

methods.name: ApiClient.create
methods.description: Factory method to create an ApiClient instance with configuration read from environment variables, defaulting to localhost.

methods.name: ApiClient._
methods.description: Private constructor to initialize ApiClient with a base URL.

methods.name: _uri
methods.description: Constructs a complete Uri object for API requests with optional query parameters.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Performs a health check GET request to the backend, returning true if successful.

methods.name: convert
methods.description: Sends a conversion request to the backend with provided data and returns the parsed response.

methods.name: getGraph
methods.description: Retrieves graph data associated with a job ID, handling different response structures.

methods.name: _safeMessage
methods.description: Extracts a user-friendly message from an HTTP response, fallback to status code message.

methods.name: ApiException
methods.description: Exception class for handling API errors with relevant status code, message, and optional response body.
